content.raw:
Ahh, I was unclear. The length of a of the whole list of member functions for a class is increased. Basically, more scrolling is required to browse the list of functions for a class. Take a look at the Actor class for example.

I'll put the briefs back in. Scrolling seems like a small price to pay for the briefs.
